properties.originatingSystemName: Greater Palm Springs Multiple Listing Service
properties.publicRemarks: Peaceful Mountain Charm Meets Modern Comfort in Upper Moonridge ~ Escape to nature without sacrificing modern amenities in this newer remodeled classic Gambrel-style cabin, nestled in the serene forest setting of Upper Moonridge. Set on a ¼-acre open lot surrounded by towering pines, this retreat offers a perfect balance of rustic charm and contemporary comfort. Step inside to discover a warm and inviting living area to your right, featuring rich hardwood flooring, beamed ceilings, and a cozy fireplace—great for curling up on chilly mountain evenings. To your left, the fully renovated kitchen boasts newer stainless steel appliances, sleek quartz countertops, updated sink and faucet, designer backsplash, modern light fixtures, and stylish hardware. A spacious dining area invites gatherings of family and friends for meals and memories. Also on the main floor is a full bathroom, thoughtfully updated with contemporary finishes, and a laundry closet with washer/dryer hookups and convenient under-stair storage. Upstairs, two oversized bedrooms with oversized closets offer ample space and comfort. Wake up to the peaceful forest views from the main bedroom window—it truly feels like you're sleeping among the treetops. A convenient powder room is located on this level for added ease. Additional 2022 upgrades include: Water heater and main water line, new roof and rain gutters and lighting and hardware throughout the home. Enjoy the mountain air from one of two spacious decks, or gather at the picnic area across the driveway for outdoor dining and relaxation. In winter, create lifelong memories sledding right on your own property. In warmer months, explore some of Big Bear's best hiking trails—several trailheads are within walking distance. And for snow sport enthusiasts, Bear Mountain Ski Resort is just a five-minute drive away. This move-in ready cabin is the perfect year-round retreat—whether you're seeking adventure, tranquility, or a blend of both.
